haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Kmdr Patrik Schorner
Fw Gebhard Schonbaum

 The mission was flown from Balatre aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 04/08/1916 near Verdun.
A F.E.2b of Esc 17 was brought down by Oswald Fromm of Jasta 16b.
S/Lt Augustin Frahier was killed in action.
S/Lt Augustin Maire was killed in action.
Oswald Fromm was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 04/08/1916 near Nesle.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc 102 was brought down by Patrik Schorner of Jasta 16b.
Alexis Nigri was made a prisoner of war.
Patrik Schorner was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 04/08/1916 near Nesle.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc 102 was brought down by Patrik Schorner of Jasta 16b.
Leonard Ducourant was made a prisoner of war.
Patrik Schorner was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 04/08/1916 near Nesle.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc 102 was brought down by Patrik Schorner of Jasta 16b.
Richard Lafon was killed in action.
Patrik Schorner was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 04/08/1916 near Bouconville-sur-Madt.
A F.E.2b of Esc 17 was brought down by Gebhard Zinn of Jasta 16b.
S/Lt Joseph Schwartz was killed in action.
Lt Justin Vallat was killed in action.
Gebhard Zinn was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 04/08/1916 near Flirey.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.48 was brought down by Bernd Treich of Jasta 16b.
S/Lt Hippolyte de Vauplane was killed in action.
Bernd Treich was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.
